title: Mathew Brady: photographer of an era
brief_description: Presents the history of the American Civil War through the lens of photographer Mathew Brady. This photographic record includes a portion of Lincoln’s second inaugural address. Music by Paul Keuter, featuring folk singer Eleanor Stone.
